mapper.select: select occurrence_time,cellid,boutique_level,limit_times,belong_area,reasons, monitor_content,monitor_value,alerm_level,complete_time from t_performance_work where questionflag = 1 limit 1000

select occurrence_time,cellid,boutique_level,limit_times,belong_area,reasons, monitor_content,monitor_value,alerm_level,complete_time from t_performance_work where questionflag = 1 GROUP BY occurrence_time ORDER BY occurrence_time DESC LIMIT 6
SELECT belong_area FROM t_performance_work GROUP BY belong_area

SELECT occurrence_time,cellid,boutique_level,limit_times,belong_area,reasons, monitor_content,monitor_value,alerm_level,complete_time FROM t_performance_work WHERE occurrence_time > DATE_SUB((SELECT occurrence_time FROM t_performance_work WHERE cellid = #{cellname} ORDER BY occurrence_time DESC LIMIT 1),INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND cellid = #{cellname}

SELECT occurrence_time,cellid,boutique_level,limit_times,belong_area,reasons, monitor_content,monitor_value,alerm_level,complete_time FROM t_performance_work WHERE occurrence_time > DATE_SUB((SELECT occurrence_time FROM t_performance_work WHERE cellid = #{cellname} ORDER BY occurrence_time DESC LIMIT 1),INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND cellid = #{cellname}
